sqlMap.sql: SELECT WIP.WIP ,WIP.WIPNAME ,WIP.WIPTYPE ,TY.WIPTYPENAME ,WIP.ISCALC ,WIP.REMARK ,WIP.CREATEDATE ,WIP.CREATEBY ,WIP.LASTUPDATE ,WIP.UPDATEBY ,WIP.ISENABLE FROM M_WIP WIP LEFT JOIN M_WIPTYPE TY ON TY.WIPTYPEID = WIP.WIPTYPE ORDER BY WIP
FROM m_wip w INNER JOIN m_user_access_wip a ON w.wip = a.wip WHERE 1=1
sqlMap.select:
SELECT isCalc ,createDate ,lastUpdate ,wipType ,createBy ,remark ,updateBy ,w.wip ,wipName FROM m_wip w INNER JOIN m_user_access_wip a ON w.wip = a.wip WHERE a.username = #updateBy#
w.wip = #wip#
w.wiptype = #wipType#

update.iterate: UPDATE m_wip SET wipName = #wipList[].wipName#, isCalc = #wipList[].isCalc#, wipType = #wipList[].wipType#, remark = #wipList[].remark# , lastUpdate = GETDATE(), updateBy = #updateBy#, isenable = #isenable# WHERE wip = #wipList[].wip#

iterate.isNotEmpty: MERGE INTO m_wip w USING (SELECT MAX(a.wip) as wip from (SELECT wip FROM m_wip WHERE wip = #wipList[].wip# UNION ALL SELECT #wipList[].wip#) a) ow ON (w.wip = ow.wip) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(wip,wipName,wipType,isCalc,createBy,updateBy, isenable) VALUES(#wipList[].wip#,#wipList[].wipName#,#wipList[].wipType#,1,#createBy#,#updateBy#, #isenable#);

sqlMap.sql: SELECT x.bumo as wip, x.name as wipName, busho as wipGroup, CASE busho when 'DIE CAST' then 1 when 'SHOT BLAST' then 3 when 'MACHINE' then 3 else 2 end as wipType

WHERE (bunr = 'PROCESS' OR busho = 'Outsource') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM m_wip mw WHERE mw.wip = x.bumo AND mw.wipName = x.name AND mw.wipGroup = busho AND mw.wipType = wipType ) bumo like #wip# + '%'
name like #wipName# + '%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT WIP.WIP ,WIP.WIPNAME ,TY.WIPTYPENAME ,WIP.ISCALC ,WIP.REMARK ,WIP.CREATEDATE ,WIP.CREATEBY ,WIP.LASTUPDATE ,WIP.UPDATEBY ,WIP.ISENABLE FROM M_WIP WIP LEFT JOIN M_WIPTYPE TY ON TY.WIPTYPEID = WIP.WIPTYPE
WIP.WIP like '%'+ #wip# + '%' WIP.WIPNAME like #wipName# + '%' WIP.ISCALC=#isCalc# TY.WIPTYPENAME like '%'+ #wipTypeName# + '%' WIP.REMARK like '%'+ #remark# + '%' CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),createdate,103)+' '+CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),createdate,108) like '%' +#createDate#+'%' CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),lastupdate,103)+' '+CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),lastupdate,108) like '%' +#lastUpdate#+'%' createBy like '%' +#createBy#+'%' updateBy like '%' +#updateBy#+'%'
ORDER BY WIP.WIP
SELECT WIPTYPEID as wipType ,WIPTYPENAME FROM M_WIPTYPE

iterate.isNotNull: MERGE INTO m_wip mw USING ( SELECT #wipList[].wip# as wipcode, #wipList[].wipName# as wipname, CASE #wipList[].wipGroup# when 'DIE CAST' then 1 when 'SHOT BLAST' then 3 when 'MACHINE' then 3 else 2 end as wiptype, #wipList[].wipGroup# as wipgroup ) w ON (mw.wip = w.wipcode) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(wip,wipName,wipType,wipGroup,createBy,updateBy) VALUES(w.wipcode,w.wipname,w.wiptype,w.wipgroup,#createBy#,#updateBy#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mw.wipname = w.wipname,mw.wiptype = w.wiptype,mw.wipgroup = w.wipgroup,mw.lastUpdate = GETDATE(),mw.updateBy = #updateBy#;

sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO m_part_wip pw USING (SELECT w.wip, w.iscalc FROM m_wip w) w ON (pw.wip = w.wip) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET pw.iscalc = w.iscalc;
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(wip) FROM m_reason_wip WHERE wip = #wip#
SELECT count(wip) FROM m_part_wip WHERE wip = #wip#
SELECT count(wip) FROM m_machine WHERE wip = #wip#
SELECT w.wip,wipName FROM m_wip w INNER JOIN m_user_access_wip a ON w.wip = a.wip WHERE a.username = #updateBy# AND (w.wip like 'FL%' or w.wip like 'FN%')

insert.iterate: Insert into m_wip () SET isCalc = #wipList[].isCalc#, wipType = #wipList[].wipType#, remark = #wipList[].remark# , lastUpdate = GETDATE(), updateBy = #updateBy# WHERE wip = #wipList[].wip#;

sqlMap.select: SELECT wip AS wip, wipName AS wipName FROM m_wip WHERE wipType = 1 ORDER BY wip

SELECT WIP.WIP ,WIP.WIPNAME ,TY.WIPTYPENAME ,WIP.ISCALC ,WIP.REMARK ,WIP.CREATEDATE ,WIP.CREATEBY ,WIP.LASTUPDATE ,WIP.UPDATEBY ,WIP.ISENABLE FROM M_WIP WIP LEFT JOIN M_WIPTYPE TY ON TY.WIPTYPEID = WIP.WIPTYPE
WIP.WIP like '%'+ #wip# + '%' WIP.WIPNAME like #wipName# + '%' WIP.ISCALC=#isCalc# TY.WIPTYPENAME like '%'+ #wipTypeName# + '%' WIP.REMARK like '%'+ #remark# + '%' CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),createdate,103)+' '+CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),createdate,108) like '%' +#createDate#+'%' CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),lastupdate,103)+' '+CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),lastupdate,108) like '%' +#lastUpdate#+'%' createBy like '%' +#createBy#+'%' updateBy like '%' +#updateBy#+'%'
ORDER BY WIP.WIP
